SELECT uc.competition_id competition_id, uc.user_id user_id, uc.win_ranking win_ranking, uc.win_level_name win_level_name, u.name name,u.user_className user_className, c.competition_name competition_name, tc.college_name college_name FROM t_user_competition uc LEFT JOIN t_user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON uc.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_college tc ON u.college_id = tc.college_id WHERE uc.competition_id = #{v} ORDER BY win_ranking
